      • runWriteCommandAction

        public static void runWriteCommandAction(Project project,
                                         java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        If run a write command using this method then "Undo" action always shows "Undefined" text - DEFAULT_COMMAND_NAME. Please use runWriteCommandAction(Project, String, String, Runnable, PsiFile...) instead.
